Medicaid Providers Colorado

Peaks Recovery Centers are NOT Medicaid providers. That being said, we believe in getting people to the appropriate level of care and have provided a list of Medicaid/ free providers below within the state of Colorado. All information presented is to the best of our knowledge. There may be further resources that we are not aware of at this time.

Medicaid Providers Colorado

  • RESADA House - (719) 456-2600. Las Animas, Colorado. Medical Detox/ inpatient services.
  • Lutheran West Pines - (303) 467-4080 Denver, Colorado. Medical Detox Services ONLY.
  • Denver Cares Inpatient - (303) 436-3572 Denver, Colorado. Social Detox/ extended IOP services.
  • Mile High Behavioral Health - (303) 353-1469 Denver, Colorado. IOP/ OP services.
  • Arapahoe House - (303) 657-3700 Denver, Colorado. IOP/ OP services
  • Crossroads Turning Point - (719) 419-7959 Pueblo, Colorado. IOP/ OP services
  • Comprehensive Behavioral Health Center - (720) 419-7959 Denver, Colorado. IOP/ OP services
  • CoreVision - (719) 634-7161 Colorado Springs, Colorado. IOP/ OP services

Free Treatment Providers - Colorado

  • Stout Street Foundation - (866) 722-7040. Commerce City, Colorado. Inpatient, extended care IOP/ OP services. Therapeutic Community (TC) based behavioral modification program for long-term addicts.
  • Salvation Army - (303) 294-0827 Denver, Colorado. IOP/ OP services. Resident ial Living. Male ONLY facility.

A Caring Recovery for Young Adult Women

Get Help Today: (888) 506-9818

Everyday millions of individuals and their families are affected by substance use disorder. Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability. We believe it paramount to the long-term success of young adults and their recovery that they continue with extended care treatment. Our client’s personal growth and recovery from alcohol and substance abuse is our highest priority. It’s why we do what we do. At Serenity Peaks Recovery we value how special your loved one is and we are committed to their long-term recovery and personal growth.
